channel.title: How do i make monsters drop things? (Pimpitupscape)
channel.description: I just wonderd if there was a way of making different monsters drop things e.g KQ dropping chans instead of just jad dropping Fcapes.

item.title: How do i make monsters drop things? (Pimpitupscape)
item.dc:creator: @invalid_name1 invalid name
item.description:
@invalid_name1 wrote:

ok this is how search for

KBD

should get

ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addSkillXP(1050, 18); }

now add this after the last }

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == MONSTERID110) { ItemHandler.addItem(ITEMID(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

That is how …

if you wanna know how to make it so they drop more then just pm im willing to help.
}

Read full topic
